entry.title: All-In-One Shower Wash | Cedar Spice
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rocky Mountain Barber Company
Type: Shower Wash
Price: 84.00 - 1664.00 (9 variants)

We set out to create an all-in-one shower wash that not only meets all your clients' grooming needs in one convenient bottle, but one that is also paraben, SLS & DEA-free. Our use of natural ingredients gives your customers a fresh and natural start to their day. MSRP: $15.99.

Key Features: Orange Sweet Oil, Cinnamon Leaf Oil & Patchouli Oil. Paraben, SLS & DEA-free.

OVERVIEW

Enjoy the Perfect Combination of Cinnamon and Spice

Using five different products in the shower can often mean five different scents mixing with each other and competing to shine through. This can result in strange, inconsistent smell combinations being created or favorite scents being compromised by the strongest scent. Our all-in-one wash will provide your customers with a consistent sensory profile so they'll never have to worry about inconsistent performance again.

Contains Essential Oils With No Added Fragrance To Clean & Protect Your Client's Body

Understanding what's in an all-in-one shower wash shouldn't require a Ph.D in chemistry. That's why we use natural ingredients and essential oils like Aloe Leaf Juice, Orange Sweet Oil, Patchouli Oil & Cinnamon Leaf Oil to achieve our scent. Our paraben, SLS & DEA-free all-in-one shower wash means your clients can feel good about they're cleaning & protecting their body.

Crafted in Small Batches to Ensure Maximum Freshness and Quality

We take product quality very seriously, which is why we create our all-in-one shower wash only in small batches to ensure our products adhere to the highest level of quality. Our frequent production runs mean your customers will receive an all-in-one wash that contains fresher ingredients each and every time.

PRO-TIPS
  • DIRECTIONS FOR BARBERS (AS A SHAMPOO): For best results, apply to your clients' hair after a cut. At wash station, rinse clients' hair and create a gentle lather. Rinse thoroughly with warm water. Style or comb as desired.
  • AT-HOME DIRECTIONS FOR YOUR CUSTOMERS: Massage first on to wet hair to create lather. Use lather on rest of body. Rinse thoroughly.
    SPECS
    • Dimensions: 13.5 cm x 5.8 cm x 5.8 cm
    • Volume: 237 ml
    INGREDIENTS
    • Water, Ammonium Lauryl sulphate, Ammonium Laureth Sulphate, Cocomidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauryl Sulfosuccinate, Glycerin, Polyquaternium 7, Phenoxyethanol, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Leaf) Juice, Citrus Sinensis (Orange Sweet) oil, Pogostemon Cablin (Patchouli) oil, Cinnamomum Zeylanicum (Cinnamon Leaf) oil, Ammonium Chloride, Citric Acid.
